functionDecorators.name: deploySimpleReturn
functionDecorators.description: Deploys a BalanceCheck contract and returns the address. Value can be passed to fund the account during the creation.

functionDecorators.name: simpleReturnAddress
functionDecorators.description: returns the address returned by the CREATE2 opcode for a given sender and given salt.

parameterDecorators.name: _salt
parameterDecorators.description: a random number that can be used to generate vanilla addresses for example.

functionDecorators.name: simpleReturnBytecode
functionDecorators.description: returns the bytecode of the contract BalanceCheck.
